submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        ans = 0
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        h = 1
        v = 1
        i = 0
        j = 0
        while i < m - 1 and j < n - 1:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                ans += horizontalCut[i] * v
                h += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += verticalCut[j] * h
                v += 1
                j += 1
        
        horizontal_cost = 0
        while i < m - 1:
            horizontal_cost += horizontalCut[i]
            i += 1
        ans += horizontal_cost * v
        
        vertical_cost = 0
        while j < n - 1:
            vertical_cost += verticalCut[j]
            j += 1
        ans += vertical_cost * h
        
        return ans
